data.title: Glo-Karting™ at K1 Speed Oxford!
data.meta_description: Glo-Karting™ at K1 Speed Oxford! Gear up for a racing experience like never before with GLO-KARTING™ at K1 Speed Oxford!  Join us ever…
data.meta_site_name: Macaroni KID Lake Orion - Rochester Hills - Oxford
data.text:
Gear up for a racing experience like never before with GLO-KARTING™ at K1 Speed Oxford! Join us every Friday evening from 5:00 pm to Close for an electrifying adventure under the lights!

What is Glo-Karting™?

Imagine the thrill of racing under the glow of state-of-the-art LED lighting, turning our track into a neon spectacle straight out of a futuristic movie! At K1 Speed, we're transforming ordinary go-karting into an extraordinary journey that will make your Fridays unforgettable!

What to Expect:

Neon-lit track barriers for an otherworldly atmosphere

Electric karts with sleek design and futuristic sounds

No extra cost compared to regular Arrive & Drive racing

Admission: $26.95 (1 race) plus an annual license ($7.95)

Location:

K1 Speed Oxford Michigan

925 N. Lapeer Rd., Ste. 137

Oxford, MI 48371

1-248-823-7677

Why Glo-Karting™?

Race under the lights and experience the thrill of futuristic go-karting.

Your stored races can be used towards this exhilarating adventure.

Spread the Word:

Tag your friends and let's light up the track together at K1 Speed Oxford! Join us for GLO-KARTING™ every Friday evening and race to the future! #K1Speed #GloKarting #FridayNightLights #OxfordMichigan #RaceToTheFuture

Note to Racers:

Don't miss the chance to be part of this illuminating experience! Arrive early, and let's make every Friday night a neon-lit adventure at K1 Speed Oxford!

Cost

Admission: $26.95 (1 race) plus an annual license ($7.95)
